thread.section_title: Flatmates.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flatmates.com.au | flatmates.com.au
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text:
A constant stream of people looking for rental situations shows that this site is well known as a good place to find somewhere to live.
My only problem is not with Flatmates but with potential renters who seem to believe that Ascot Vale is beyond the limit of the known world. Even so I now have a fine renter who seems to be happy with living 400 metres west of Parkville
I must apologise to all the other potential renters who would be wonderful to live near but it was necessary to apply fairly strict criteria to maximise the possibility of a good fit with the current renters.
